result.execSummary:
The defendant Eric John Reuteler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Submit a DNA sample; pay DNA surcharge. Pay all costs and surcharges or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

- AODA assessment/treatment deemed appropriate.
- Perform 20 hours of community service.
- Maintain full time employment/school or a combination of both.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Eric John Reuteler in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Eric John Reuteler in court.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation.  Status conference scheduled for August 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff: 07/11/2015

Cash bail that was previously posted to remain. No use or possession of any controlled substances or drug paraphenilia without a valid prescription.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 08-06-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Eric John Reuteler
Current: 2978 South Herman Street Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53207   (Effective: 07-14-2015)
Prior: 2978 South Herman Street Upper, Milwaukee, WI 53207

Defendant Eric John Reuteler in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 24.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 7/14/15 @ 1:30 PM
